RTS Chapel Proposal: Dual-Purpose Emergency Refuge & Worship Facility

10

We can show Alabama and the nation that public housing authorities can be innovative,
entrepreneurial, and effective. We can build housing that serves everyone from firefighters to
food service workers, creating communities where all families can thrive.
The Mobile Housing Authority has the chance to lead. With your approval, we can begin making
this vision a reality.

Appendix: Key Numbers Summary

Workforce Housing
● 120 homes × 1,350 square feet × $110 per square foot
● Total cost: $23,943,000
● Sales revenue: $32,148,000
● Profit: $8,205,000
Affordable Apartments
● 80 units × 850 square feet × $110 per square foot
● Total cost: $8,000,000
● Master Entity contribution: $4,000,000
● Bond financing needed: $4,000,000
● Annual cash flow: $657,587
Debt Coverage
● Annual net income: $900,587
● Annual debt payment: $243,000
● Coverage ratio: 3.71 times
